scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Sharon
scrape.text: Ugh, I'm so tired of books about loathsome people doing despicable things that are billed under the headings of "edgy" or "provocative." The Dinner is neither of those things, nor written in a compelling enough fashion to make up for its flaws. Too predictable to be a thriller, too hypocritically fascinated with its sociopathic characters to be read as an indictment against them, and the entire trope of the eponymous dinner as a narrative frame was gimmicky and unnecessary.
